name: Shark Hunter Scuba Diving 3D
description: Grab your sniper rifle and harpoon get ready to sail over water with boat and take down angry sharks attacking humans. People swimming and relaxing on beach but a horde of wild sharks start to attack the citizens. With sniper scope take down the angry sharks, some more sharks attacking fisherman boat on the water. Sail on boat to help those fisherman and take down crazy sharks.
